1.12.17  12:39 am   Hey, Bill! You mentioned that you think it's best to write complete songs, then produce them. I think it's a cool concept, it gives focus and keeps it real very well but... have you ever been inspired or triggered to elaborate on an idea that is not song based but production based? For instance sounds, little arrangements, noodles, sequences, etc.

1.11.17  10:38 pm   I have a similar motivation to what you do, I feel like every second not working on a project is a second wasted. What is different, however, is that I don't feel that "infinite things to do with finite time" push because I just don't feel like there's an infinite amount of things I can do. I just focus on one project until its done, and hang out until inspiration strikes. Was there ever a point where you felt like that, but transitioned into a mad dash of as much as possible?
